name: CX Easy Contact Form
author: Cypherox Technologies

sections.description:
The CX Easy Contact Form is simply used to send emails with the names of all team members.
It is a minimal and lightweight plugin that is simple to integrate with WordPress.

It is simple to use even for non-technical people.
Install the WordPress plugin and activate it with a single click.
After that, check the screenshot and copy the ShortCode [cxecf_contact_form] from the settings page. (Don’t forget to update required fields like email) Simply copy and paste it into your desire page, and you’re done. Enjoy.

If you need any help for custom theme and plugin development Contact US @ info@cypherox.com

Todo list

  • Google and Math Captcha Integration
  • Custom Fields
  • Email Templates
  • Pre-Built form templates
  • Submission entry in Database.
sections.installation:
1. Go to Plugins in the Admin menu
  2. Click on the button Add new
  3. Search for CX Easy Contact Form and click ‘Install Now’ or click on the upload link to upload cx-easy-contact-form.zip
  4. Click on Activate plugin
sections.changelog:
1.0.1: December 27, 2022

  • Bug Fix : file upload validation

1.0.0: November 15, 2022

  • Birthday of CX Easy Contact Form
